A) What is Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA - top

Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA is a addon for Mailwizz EMA (https://codecanyon.net/item/mailwizz-email-marketing-application/6122150), it allow you to compose newsletter with a powerful and easy to use drag&drop editor

B) How to install it - top

You can install it like all other MailWizz extensions:
- Login in the backend of your MailWizz EMA powered website and navigate to Extensions menu.
- Hit the upload button and select the extension archive and upload it.
- Enable the extension then click on it's title to go to the extension page from where you can input your details.



C) How to enable/disable Filemanager - top

Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA replace the standard editor, but it continue to use same file browser, so to enable/disable filemanager you can continue to use normal way:
- Login in the backend of your MailWizz EMA powered website and navigate to Extensions menu.
- Choose built-in CKEditor extension - Set File Manager options



D) How to create a Template with Drag&Drop Editor - top

In template section you will have a new button to create a beautifull templates with Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA extension, of course you can continue to create templates with a standard MailWizz editor.
NOTE: Templates created with standard MailWizz editor continue to using standard editor when you create/edit Campaign



E) How to use it in Campaign - top

When you create a new Campaign you will see Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA
NOTE: Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA will be enabled in all new Campaign, to use a standard MailWizz editor you need to use a template created with standard MailWizz editor
